channel.title: Help With Hosting Server
channel.description:
ok, if anyone could help, it would be great...heres what i did.
1. i downloaded and installed no-ip, and i made my server name... 2. i went to the guide for my router, which is 2wire. 3. i made an application called "rune" and i made the ports from and to 43594, and the main port 43594. 4. i made it so the application would not be blocked by firewall (which is what it said to do.) 5. i turned on no-ip and went to my server file. and ran it. 6. it said it was starting up on 0.0.0.0 which isnt right.... 7. i cant log on, and im stuck
if someone could help me out, it would be awesome
thanks, wookiezz

item.title: Help With Hosting Server
item.dc:creator: @wookiezz wookiezz
item.description:
@wookiezz wrote:

well it cant be the source, and i did the exact thing that the guide said to do…

thanks,
wookiezz

item.title: Help With Hosting Server
item.dc:creator: @wookiezz wookiezz
item.description:
@wookiezz wrote:

ok, if anyone could help, it would be great…heres what i did.

  1. i downloaded and installed no-ip, and i made my server name…
  2. i went to the guide for my router, which is 2wire.
  3. i made an application called “rune” and i made the ports from and to 43594, and the main port 43594.
  4. i made it so the application would not be blocked by firewall (which is what it said to do.)
  5. i turned on no-ip and went to my server file. and ran it.
  6. it said it was starting up on 0.0.0.0 which isnt right…
  7. i cant log on, and im stuck

if someone could help me out, it would be awesome

thanks,
wookiezz

Read full topic
